website_summaries.verdict: Puma Basket Heart DE sweeps off the feet of style-savvy female shoppers with its uber-sized laces -- a fantabulous spin to the classic Puma Basket. The sporty leather aesthetic of the Puma Basket is softened by its flimsy shoelaces which can be styled in many ways.This soul pleaser is garbed with a thoroughly cushioned tongue, collar, and footbed. The sizing and fit of this shoe may run small, but wearers can forget about foot discomfort while getting all glammed up under this peachy and comfy sneaker.
pros: The Puma Basket Heart DE didn’t pose any discomfort to the feet even when used the whole day, according to lots of charmed users
Several reviewers fancied the thick shoelaces which come in two designs
The broad laces do not crease at all
It offers a right amount of arch support, according to several reviews
A flat-footed wearer who usually gets foot aches even with sneakers that have thick memory foams loved the fit of this shoe and planned to obtain two more styles
It comes with an appropriately sized length
The color options available for this sneaker are a feast for the eyes
Several reviewers were enamored by the ultra-feminine tone of the red colorway which isn’t too dark or bright
“Irresistibly cute” and “super cute” are the typical descriptions of reviewers who are charmed by the Basket Heart DE
A couple of reviewers who found the Fenty line way above their budget, are thrilled with the pocket-friendly cost of the Puma Basket Heart DE
Excellent value for money as it is comfortable to the feet
These kicks are a lot adorable on foot, exclaimed by many
cons: This Basket Heart DE from the Jumping Cat stands out well but feels small that some reviewers sized up, such as those with bunions and wide feet
Its leather body needs some break-in time as it is tough in the beginning, declared by several users
Not the kind of shoe to wear for roughing up, as mentioned by some

customer_reviews.title: I am a real Puma fan
customer_reviews.text: So originally I ordered these shoes for my daughter who is in the fifth grade the shoe is too small for her so I ended up keeping it for myself it's a eight and a half I still have like little room in the front I'm surprised she couldn't fit it that so many compliments on thid shoe its really cute
customer_reviews.author: Christian Lewis

customer_reviews.title: VERY Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Puma brand sneakers for years and was quite surprised with how disappointed I am with these shoes. The tongue is attached to the bottom of the shoe with elastic so there are bulges at the bottom of the shoes that stick into your feet and there arw also bulges at the top of the shoe for the laces go through. All of these bulges make these really beautiful shoes too uncomfortable to wear again. Sadly, I brought them on vacation with me and didn't try them on beforehand have the blisters to prove it. I feel like I just threw the money in the garbage for them. :(
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I love these pumas. Looks exactly like the picture. i wIll order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sagyne 😊

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: So, I needed some gold glitter sneakers to go with the decor for my birthday celebration. I came across these and fell in love. They fit a bit larger than expected but, that was a plus for me because I normally wear 11W so the extra room was gladly appreciated. I love the bigger shoe laces. At first, I thought I would only want to wear them to match my outfit on my birthday but, they're so cute that I'm going to pair them with other outfits as well. Love this sneaker!
customer_reviews.author: CAcakelady

customer_reviews.title: Blue HOLOGRAPHIC - so cool! I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally in love with this shoe now that I've received it - it's a sparkly holographic blue that changes colors a little! It has both satin and grosgrain wide ribbon laces that are super cute. It fits like a typical Puma - more roomy in the toe area, moderate arch support with squishy insoles, and a nice sticky sole. I bought these for work - I'm a body shop estimator - so I'm running around on slippery concrete or dirty asphalt all day. They add a little sparkle to my otherwise boring blue polo shirt/black pants uniform.
customer_reviews.author: SmittyKel

customer_reviews.title: Laces not really pictured well but LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: They're really cute! The pics didn't show how the laces REALLY look. They almost look like Velcro on the photos. Instead they are very large thick laces that create really big bows when you tie them.
customer_reviews.author: StephBia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful style, but they do run a bit large.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. But as another customer stated, they do run large. I've bought 3 pairs in different colors/patterns. Of the three, only the grey pair with embroidery runs true to size. These blue ones and the red patent run large. That said, I do love them. I've had soooo many compliments on them. The style is just wonderful. If you're a size 8, like me, I strongly suggest going down a half-size, or, if you want size 8, be prepared to buy some insoles to make them fit well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Vale-Allen

customer_reviews.title: Cute but hurt (yes I got the right size).
customer_reviews.text: While I loved the style of these shoes, there is an odd part inside that absolutely kills my toes when rubbed the wrong way. Coincidentally, my son complained of the same discomfort in the exact style of pumas he had too and I chalked it up to scrunched socks. What I realized after getting my pair is that it’s a design flaw. It might not affect everyone but it makes the shoes impossible for me to wear for too long.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe but narrow in the toe area
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they are just a bit too narrow at the toes. I wear them for the look not the comfort so if I’m going to be on my feet long, I have to choose a different shoe even if I would rather wear these.

customer_reviews.text: I’ve been eyeing these for months and read 100 or more reviews. I’m glad I went for them. They are super cute and comfy. I wear a 8 1/2 and have wide feet.

I am recovering from achilles tendon surgery so needed something comfortable yet stylish! I was able to dance the night away so glad I ordered them and you couldn't beat the price! SMOOCHESS

product_meta.title: Puma Women's Basket Heart De Wn Sneaker
product_meta.description: PUMA updates the most iconic style, the basket classic, creating a statement piece, replacing the classic lacing for and XL ribbon! the heart style comes with two different laces to achieve different looks, one more sport casual and the other more elegant to dress your outfit up! basket heart de has a leather upper with a suede formstripe, and it features an edgy woven lace with knitted 'PUMA' branding. The basket hearts are this seasons must-haves
